participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Melancholic and introspective, struggling with self-esteem and seeking connection.
participant_1.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i work at a nursing home. my wife left me and took my children.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and lively, with a positive outlook and a passion for outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i am a huge coffee lover. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol.
